<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.SecurityEventSender</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Call SecurityEventSender for sending events to Usage Analytics</description> <name>SecurityEventSender</name> <script><![CDATA[var SecurityEventSender = Class.create();
SecurityEventSender.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { process: function() { var eventName = this.getParameter('sysparm_eventName'); var parm1 = this.getParameter('sysparm_parm1'); var parm2 = this.getParameter('sysparm_parm2'); SNC.SecurityEventSender.sendEventData(eventName, parm1, parm2); },
type: "SecurityEventSender" });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-10-13 21:38:10</sys_created_on> <sys_id>24e3e4b08f3321003edbc38ee0f92334</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SecurityEventSender</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Schema for contextual security" source="com.glide.security_schema">8eac74436d2220100acb70b3534330b8</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_24e3e4b08f3321003edbc38ee0f92334</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2014-10-13 23:48:54</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>417</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
